item.description:
American Society of Picture Professionals New England Chapter Presents
LEGAL SYMPOSIUM

Where: Pearson Education, 501 Boylston Street, Boston
When: Thursday, December 3, 2009 6:30-8:30 pm

Join us for one of our most popular annual events!

Drew Epstein a prominent Boston copyright lawyer will be joined by Jim Grace, Co-Director of the Volunteer Lawyers for the Arts, to host a copyright presentation and Q&A.

In addition to giving us updates on the legal issues surrounding the Orphan Works Bill and the Google Books Settlement and its opponents, we have asked our speakers to discuss copyright questions as they relate to Wikipedia and Facebook.

Fees: $5.00 members and students/$10.00 for non-members

RSVP: aspp.newengland@gmail.com

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: LEGAL SYMPOSIUM: Copyright Presentation and Q&A
